mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_LAWYER_LIKE (LAWYER_LIKE_ID, MEMBER_ID, LAWYER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_LAWYER_LIKE.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{lawyerId})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM R, LL1.* FROM (SELECT L02.*, LO3.LOCATION_NAME FROM ( SELECT F3.*, LO1.LOCATION_ID FROM ( SELECT F1.LAWYER_LIKE_ID, F1.LAWYER_ID, F1.MEMBER_ID, F1.LAWYER_NAME, F1.LAWYER_INTRODUCTION, F1.LAWYER_IMAGE, LISTAGG(F2.FIELD_TITLE, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY F2.FIELD_TITLE) AS FIELD_TITLE FROM ( SELECT L1.LAWYER_LIKE_ID, L1.LAWYER_ID, L1.MEMBER_ID, L1.LAWYER_NAME, L1.LAWYER_INTRODUCTION, L1.LAWYER_IMAGE, LF.FIELD_ID FROM ( SELECT LL.LAWYER_LIKE_ID, LL.LAWYER_ID, LL.MEMBER_ID, L.LAWYER_NAME, L.LAWYER_INTRODUCTION, L.LAWYER_IMAGE FROM TBL_LAWYER_LIKE LL JOIN TBL_LAWYER L ON L.LAWYER_ID = LL.LAWYER_ID WHERE LL.MEMBER_ID = 2 ORDER BY LL.LAWYER_LIKE_ID DESC ) L1 JOIN TBL_LAWYER_FIELD LF ON L1.LAWYER_ID = LF.LAWYER_ID ) F1 JOIN TBL_FIELD F2 ON F1.FIELD_ID = F2.FIELD_ID GROUP BY F1.LAWYER_LIKE_ID, F1.LAWYER_ID, F1.MEMBER_ID, F1.LAWYER_NAME, F1.LAWYER_INTRODUCTION, F1.LAWYER_IMAGE ) F3 JOIN TBL_LAWYER_LOCATION LO1 ON LO1.LAWYER_ID = F3.LAWYER_ID ) L02 JOIN TBL_LOCATION LO3 ON LO3.LOCATION_ID = L02.LOCATION_ID) LL1
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pagination.endRow}) LL2 WHERE LL2.R >= #{pagination.startRow}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_LAWYER_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND LAWYER_ID = #{lawyerId}
